summary:
Grilli's Mini Zoo v1.5

i had the idea for a zoo in skyrim.
It is only a house with creatures.
descriptionHtml:
Grilli's Mini Zoo v1.5

I do not know, if there is another mod like this, but i had the idea for a zoo in skyrim.
It is only a house with creatures. it makes no sense, but a lot of fun.
inside you'll meet some 'old friends' who have a look what's going on.
the creatures inside are shrinked and made unagressive by 'magic'.

the location is near whitewatch tower south east along the road about 300 meters.
i do not know, if there are other mods at this location, but i think it's a good place.

[youtube]1-LJ8mKfDo8[/youtube]

MANY THANKS TO 'BRODUAL', WHO SENT ME THIS GREAT VIDEO !!!


notes

i tested the mod in an english and german version of skyrim, with and without dawnguard and hearthfire, and all runs fine. sometimes when i zapped through too much savegames, the people in the zoo disappeared. if you have this problem too, only restart the game and all runs fine. (this mod needs a lot of ram, if you have 4gb or less, i can not say if it runs stable).
and please hold your updates of skyrim at the latest state to avoid crashes.

i cleaned this mod with tes5edit to prevent problems.
i do not know, if there are conflicts with other mods. please tell me if you find some.
this mod is now tested with hearthfire and i think it runs correct !!!

PLEASE INSTALL THE MAIN FILE FIRST !!! THEN OVERWRITE WITH OPTIONAL ONE IF YOU PLAY THE GERMAN OR DRAGONLESS VERSION. THE ARCHIVE AND DARKFACES FIX IS NOT INCLUDED IN OPTIONAL VERSIONS, ONLY THE ESP FILE !!!

if you have any problems with this mod, please make a post.
if you like it, make a post too.
thanks a lot.

INCOMPATIBLE MODS:

The zoo from this mod is on the exact same place as the Dwarven Parking from the Dwarven Automobiles mod, which breaks both of the mods.
(posted by "samcrabchan")



LATEST VERSION 1.5
many of you want to buy souveniers at the zoo.
here they are. i made 31 jars with creatures, animals and stuff.
you can buy them from merchant belethor in the zoo.
the jars are a bit smaller than the originals in game, so they fit better in bookshelves.
( if you have 'unlimited bookshelves' mod installed )
the souveniers are not cheap! my zoo needs the gold. :)
(deutsche version unter 'optional files'. bitte erst die hauptversion runterladen, dann mit deutscher version Ã¼berschreiben!)
so have fun with lots of new things for your home!

VERSION 1.4
- no zoo without an aquarium
- added a second room with fish
(no masterpiece in architecture, i know)
- very simple made and without lots of stuff

VERSION 1.3
- some small fixes
- when i played last time, merchants left their position. hope they stay now
at the correct place.
- set the starting point a bit more far from the zoo
- file comes with dragons. i add a 'dragonless' to optional files

VERSION v1.2
- for all of you, who think there are too much people inside, be happy now.
- rush hour is from 12:00 to 22:00.
- at 22:00 i send the children to bed for 7 hours.
- at 6:00 most of the old ones go for 6 hours.
- the best time to have a look is from 6:00 to 12:00.
- the bedroom is locked and there is no key for you!

(for the 'darkfaces bug': inside the zip-file there are
two directories, 'data/meshes and data/textures. put them to your data directory. nothing will be removed from your files. this are only the 'face tint colour' files.)
these files are only included in the mainfile. so install this first and then an optional file version, if you play the german or dragonless mod.
have a nice day in zoo.

grilli
author: grilli
